title: Sothebys Auction Lots - Italian Modern Art (Art Paintings nrg)
description:
Italian Modern Art
610 jpg | up to 1946*2000 | 276 Mb

SothebyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s annual 20th Century Italian Art sale on 12 October 2012 in London boasts exceptional works by modern and contemporary masters. The cover lot of the sale is a beautiful Manzoni Achrome (1959) which displays a thickly pleated surface, unique of its kind. Highlights of the sale include stunning sculptures by Marino Marini, an outstanding Combustione Plastica by Alberto Burri, and major examples from Lucio FontanaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Cuts, Oils and Holes series. Important paintings by Giorgio Morandi and Giorgio de Chirico are complemented by museum-quality sculptures from Arte Povera artists Pino Pascali, Luciano Fabro, and Giulio Paolini, as well as a very rare purple Mappa by Alighiero Boetti.
